Author: jl777c#5810
Content: it is technically impossible to mine or even stake if you are not running code

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: you could delegate to another node to stake for you

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: or it could be a utxo timestamp based rewards mechanism like KMD has

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: but without an initial amount, there is nothing to gain rewards on

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: so a faucet combined with utxo rewards system would be needed

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: an uncapped faucet would massively dilute any coinsupply, even if it wasnt "staking"

Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
@gigamesh there were z-addresses on KMD but they are not allowed anymore
the total supply of KMD can be verified on the blockchain to be equal to the total emission

Author: KomodoWorld#8282
Content: the sapling parameters were generated by 200 partecipants, if someone seriously believes all of  them can be compromised then it logically follows that everything else is likely compromised as well,  including Bitcoin developers or ECDSA. The fact is no one seriously believes that, it's just fud

Author: gcharang#6833
Content: Also, just 1 honest participant ensures the security of the parameters

Author: gcharang#6833
Content: by the time they were deprecated, less than 5% of the addresses were using z-addresses on the Komodo chain edit: less than 0.15%
